Only some medicines and vaccines are safe during pregnancy. Ask your health care provider about how best to protect you and your baby.",MPlusHealthTopics,Infections and Pregnancy
What is (are) Eczema ?,"Eczema is a term for several different types of skin swelling. Eczema is also called dermatitis. Most types cause dry, itchy skin an
